live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43723.summary: Some customers in the Lawson Heights area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43723.title: Nov 7 – Saskatoon ( Lawson Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
